item.title: Zelenskyy says Russia trying to create 'impression of ceasefire' as attacks continue
item.description: Zelenskyy said that Russia must fully adhere to the ceasefire conditions and reiterated Ukraine's offer to extend the truce for 30 days, starting midnight Sunday.

item.title: Pope Francis does surprise Easter Sunday popemobile tour as he recovers from illness
item.description: "Brothers and sisters, Happy Easter!" Francis said, his voice sounding stronger than it has since his hospitalization. "Viva il Papa!" (Long live the pope), the crowd responded.

item.title: Iran and the U.S. plan expert-level talks over Tehran's nuclear program
item.description: The two countries will begin having experts meet to discuss details of a possible deal over Tehran's rapidly advancing nuclear program, the top Iranian diplomat said after a second round of talks.
